arStrings.szText: If an enemy dies while being {c_important}Decomposed{/c}, you gain {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} Essence.
Every {c_number}[SF_1|1|]{/c} seconds, {c_important}Decompose{/c} make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.

{c_important}Decompose{/c} Slows enemies by {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c}, and if you channel Decompose for at least {c_number}[SF_1|1|]{/c} seconds, you gain {c_number}[SF_22 * 100|%+|]{/c} Movement Speed for {c_number}{SF_23}{/c} seconds after ending the channel.
